Hong Kong national security law: US consulate in city breaks silence, warns of chilling effect of new legislation

  • In rare move, diplomatic office also hits back at allegations staff had colluded with opposition camp
  • It calls new legislation ‘ill-defined, vaguely worded and far-reaching’
